title: Born equal
creator_credit: Australian Instructional Films and Langton Gould-Marks
brief_description: Brief scenes are used to illustrate the meaning and purpose of the United Nations Declaration of Human Rights; that all people should be able to live their own lives as they desire with equality of opportunity, freedom of religion and speech, and with the tolerance of their fellow human beings. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
